title: Why is everyone so fucking whiny?
body: ^ Someone is always complaining about matchmaking or how they’re going to quit the game.

replies.body: Everyone needs an excuse on why they cant climb out of bronze.

> [{quoted}](name=Too Unlucky,realm=NA,application-id=6heBIhQc,discussion-id=vHuE3mPV,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-02T15:22:27.255+0000)
>
> Everyone needs an excuse on why they cant climb out of bronze.

No I need an excuse on why I can't climb out of silver.... It's because your mind controlling me to make me horrible at this game.... Or maybe I just suck but I'ma go with the former cause I'm awesome.
What's more cringeworthy, posts complaining about things or posts saying how perfect everything is and starting with "I just wanted to take a moment to say thank you to Riot for..."
